comments:
Description:
RunTimeException when click Property Editor while preview view is active.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Click Preview in Layout.
2. Click Property Editor.

Result:
java.lang.RuntimeException: WARNING: Prevented recursive attempt to activate part org.eclipse.pde.runtime.LogView while still in the middle of activating part org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.ui.editors.ReportEditor
